00009 // -- CLASS DESCRIPTION [PDF] --
00010 // Here we declared the B- -> D0 K- pdf
00011 // read hep-ex/0308043 equation (2)
00012 // M- = f(m-^2,m+^2)+rb Exp(i(-\gamma_+\delta_) * f(m+^2,m-^2)
00013 
00014 //#include "BaBar/BaBar.hh"
00015

00017 #include <fstream>

00035 // constructor
00036 BdkDKDalitz::BdkDKDalitz(const char *theName, const char *theTitle,
00037                          RooAbsReal& m12, RooAbsReal& m13,
00038                          RooAbsReal& x, RooAbsReal& y,
00039                          BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flavor, 
00040                          BdkDalitzBase::Mode DdecMode,
00041                          BdkAbsDDalitzAmp* amp):
00042   BdkDalitzBase(theName, theTitle, flavor, DdecMode),
00043   _m12("m12","Invariant Mass square of pi0 pi+",this,m12),
00044   _m13("m13","Invariant Mass square of pi0 pi-",this,m13),
00045   _x("x","Real part of rB*phase",this,x),
00046   _y("y","Imaginary part of rB*phase",this,y)
00047 {
00048   if (amp==0) _dalitzAmp = new BdkDDalitzAmp(TString(GetName()) + ".dalitzAmp",
00049                                              TString(GetTitle()) + " dalitzAmp",
00050                                              this);
00051   else {
00052     _dalitzAmp = amp;
00053     // register all parameters with us
00054     _dalitzAmp->registerParams(this);
00055   }
00056 }

00060 BdkDKDalitz::BdkDKDalitz(const BdkDKDalitz& other, const char* name) :

00064   _x("x",this,other._x),
00065   _y("y",this,other._y),
00066   _dalitzAmp(other._dalitzAmp)
00067 {
00068   // register all parameters with us
00069   _dalitzAmp->registerParams(this);
00070 }

00074 }
00075 
00076 Double_t BdkDKDalitz::evaluate() const
00077 {
00078   // these are m12 and m13 for B-:
00079   double m12temp = _m12;
00080   double m13temp = _m13;
00081 
00082   // flip for B+:
00083   if (BdkDalitzBase::D0BAR == flavor()) {
00084     m12temp = _m13;
00085     m13temp = _m12;
00086   }
00087 
00088   RooComplex Damp    =  _dalitzAmp->getamp(m12temp, m13temp);
00089   RooComplex Dbaramp =  _dalitzAmp->getamp(m13temp, m12temp);
00090 
00091   //  RooComplex c(_rB*cos(phaseRad()),_rB*sin(phaseRad()));
00092   RooComplex c(_x,_y);
00093 
00094   _lastAmp = Damp + c*(Dbaramp);
00095   return _lastAmp.abs2();
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 Int_t BdkDKDalitz::getAnalyticalIntegral(RooArgSet& allVars, RooArgSet& analVars, const char* rangeName) const 
00100 {
00101   if (matchArgs(allVars,analVars,_m12,_m13)) return 1 ;
00102   return 0 ;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 
00107 Double_t BdkDKDalitz::analyticalIntegral(Int_t code, const char* rangeName) const 
00108 {
00109   assert(code==1) ;
00110   return getNormalization();
00111 } 
00112 
00113 
00114 Double_t BdkDKDalitz::getNormalization() const
00115 {
00116   //  RooComplex c(_x,_y);
00117   //  Double_t norm = _p3.getVal()+(c.abs2())*_p2.getVal()+
00118   //                   2.0*(_p0.getVal()*(c.re())+_p1.getVal()*(c.im()));
00119 
00120   Double_t norm = _dalitzAmp->normDSqr() +
00121                   (_x*_x + _y*_y) * _dalitzAmp->normDbarSqr() +
00122                   2*_x*_dalitzAmp->normReDDbar() + 
00123                   2*_y*_dalitzAmp->normImDDbar();
00124 
00125   return norm;
00126 }
